title: If I was GM …
itunes:title: If I was GM …
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler discuss the latest news from the NFL, including injury updates for both Tony Romo and Percy Harvin. Then, the heroes act as General Managers in the NFL and try to improve various teams with their own trade ideas.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
